abstract: Students talk about Stewart D. Friedman, a management professor at the Wharton School, with a mixture of earnest admiration, gratitude and rock star adoration.
lead_paragraph: Students talk about Stewart D. Friedman, a management professor at the Wharton School, with a mixture of earnest admiration, gratitude and rock star adoration.

headline.main: Hot Ticket in B-School: Bringing Life Values to Corporate Ethics
